title: Hoarder - A self-hostable bookmark-everything app
description: I've been searching for ways to unify my bookmarks across all my devices, and this seems to be a pretty promising solution. In fact, this very goal of wanting to unify where I save my links/bookmarks for easy retrieval is why I decided to build this webpage for saving/sharing links. I also have been wanting to learn how to self-host services - screw relying on SAAS. This seems easy enough, and also extremely useful for me.

title: Nerd Fonts Cheat Sheet
description: I really like the icons provided here. At the time of writing this, I use a few icons in my tmux and neovim setups.

title: pH-1 '인생영화 (Feat. 정지소)' Official MV
description: I really like pH-1, and this is a great song. But separately, I really like the interior of the house they shot this MV at.

title: How to replace the battery in your AirTag
description: Apparently replacing the battery in your AirTag is super easy. tldr: it uses a [CR2032 battery](https://www.amazon.com/Amazon-Basics-CR2032-Compatible-Mercury-Free/dp/B0787K2XWZ/ref=sr_1_1_ffob_sspa?sr=8-1-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGY&psc=1).

title: Cool colorscheme
description: I really like the colorscheme of this blog, maybe I'll take inspiration from it.
